SELECT dc.COMMENT_ID ,dc.CNTNTS_SE_CODE ,dc.CNTNTS_ID ,CASE WHEN (dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_000000ADMIN' || dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_00000000251') AND dc.WRTER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN dc.WRTER_ID WHEN dc.WRTER_ID IS NULL THEN B.MBER_ID ELSE B.MBER_ID END AS WRTER_ID ,dc.WRTER_NM ,dc.COMMENT_CN ,dc.COMMENT_SORT_ORDR ,dc.COMMENT_NO ,dc.COMMENT_PARNT_ID ,dc.COMMENT_REPLY_LC ,dc.RECOMEND_CO ,dc.UNRECOMEND_CO ,dc.USE_AT ,dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,dc.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,dc.LAST_UPDUSER_ID ,dc.SECRET_AT ,dc.SCORE ,dc.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM DTN_COMMENT dc JOIN DTN_MBER B ON dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS A ON dc.CNTNTS_ID = A.GOODS_ID
ORDER BY dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC,dc.SCORE DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM DTN_COMMENT dc LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS A ON dc.CNTNTS_ID = A.GOODS_ID

SELECT COMMENT_ID ,CNTNTS_SE_CODE ,CNTNTS_ID ,CASE WHEN (dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_000000ADMIN' || dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_00000000251') AND dc.WRTER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN dc.WRTER_ID WHEN dc.WRTER_ID IS NULL THEN A.MBER_ID ELSE A.MBER_ID END AS MBER_ID ,WRTER_NM ,COMMENT_CN ,dc.PASSWORD ,COMMENT_SORT_ORDR ,COMMENT_NO ,COMMENT_PARNT_ID ,COMMENT_REPLY_LC ,RECOMEND_CO ,UNRECOMEND_CO ,USE_AT ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSER_ID ,SCORE ,SECRET_AT ,ATCH_FILE_ID FROM DTN_COMMENT dc JOIN DTN_MBER A ON dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = A.ESNTL_ID WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}

SELECT CASE WHEN AVG(A.SCORE) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AVG(A.SCORE) END AS SCORE FROM DTN_COMMENT A JOIN STN_GOODS B ON A.CNTNTS_ID = B.GOODS_ID WHERE A.USE_AT='Y' AND A.CNTNTS_SE_CODE = 'STN_ORDER' AND B.GOODS_ID=#{searchGoodsId}
SELECT B.* FROM DTN_COMMENT A JOIN DTN_FILE_DETAIL B ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID AND A.COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
SELECT A.* FROM STN_ORDER A WHERE A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId} AND A.GOODS_ID=#{goodsId} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.GOODS_ID , A.GOODS_CTGRY_ID , A.PCMAPNG_ID , A.GOODS_KND_CODE , A.GOODS_NM , A.MODEL_NM , A.MAKR , A.ORGPLCE , A.BRAND_ID , A.CRTFC_MATTER , A.CNSLT_TELNO , A.GOODS_INTRCN , A.EVNT_WORDS , A.MNGR_MEMO , A.MVP_SOURC_CN , A.GOODS_CN , A.GOODS_PC , A.GOODS_RSRVMNEY , A.GOODS_RSRVMNEY_RATE_AT , A.GOODS_RSRVMNEY_RATE , A.MRKT_PC , A.TAXT_SE_CODE , A.DLVY_SE_CODE , A.DLVY_PC , A.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , A.SBSCRPT_MIN_USE_WEEK , A.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_MIN_USE_MT , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , A.SBSCRPT_SETLE_DAY , A.BUNDLE_DLVY_AT , A.BUNDLE_DLVY_CO , A.RDCNT , A.SLE_CO , A.OPTN_USE_AT , A.D_OPTN_USE_AT , A.A_OPTN_USE_AT , A.F_OPTN_USE_AT , A.Q_OPTN_USE_AT , A.SOLD_OUT_AT , A.REGIST_STTUS_CODE , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.USE_AT , B.GOODS_IMAGE_SN , B.GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH , C.BRAND_NM , C.BRAND_IMAGE_PATH , C.BRAND_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH FROM STN_GOODS A LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_IMAGE B ON A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID AND GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE='GNR' AND GOODS_IMAGE_SN = '1' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_BRAND C ON A.BRAND_ID = C.BRAND_ID WHERE A.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}
SELECT * FROM DTN_COMMENT A WHERE A.WRTER_ID = #{wrterId} AND A.USE_AT='Y' AND A.CNTNTS_SE_CODE = 'STN_ORDER' AND A.CNTNTS_ID=#{cntntsId}

SELECT dc.COMMENT_ID ,dc.CNTNTS_SE_CODE ,dc.CNTNTS_ID ,dc.WRTER_ID ,dc.WRTER_NM ,dc.COMMENT_CN ,dc.COMMENT_SORT_ORDR ,dc.COMMENT_NO ,dc.COMMENT_PARNT_ID ,dc.COMMENT_REPLY_LC ,dc.RECOMEND_CO ,dc.UNRECOMEND_CO ,dc.USE_AT ,dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,dc.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,dc.LAST_UPDUSER_ID ,dc.SECRET_AT ,dc.SCORE ,dc.ATCH_FILE_ID ,A.GOODS_ID AS SEARCH_GOODS_ID ,A.GOODS_ID ,A.GOODS_NM FROM DTN_COMMENT dc JOIN STN_GOODS A ON dc.CNTNTS_ID = A.GOODS_ID
AND dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId} ORDER BY dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DTN_COMMENT dc JOIN STN_GOODS A ON dc.CNTNTS_ID = A.GOODS_ID
AND dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId}

SELECT A.GOODS_ID , A.GOODS_NM , A.GOODS_KND_CODE , C.ORDER_NO , C.ORDER_KND_CODE , CASE WHEN C.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'WEEK' THEN CONCAT(C.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE, '주') WHEN C.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(C.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE, '월') END AS SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE_NM , CASE WHEN C.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'WEEK' THEN CONCAT(CODE3.CODE_NM, '요일') WHEN C.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(C.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY, '일') END AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY_NM , C.SBSCRPT_USE_WEEK , C.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , C.SBSCRPT_USE_MT , C.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , C.ORDER_CO , C.TOT_AMOUNT , C.NOW_ODR , B.COMMENT_ID , (SELECT GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH FROM STN_GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID = A.GOODS_ID AND GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE = 'GNR' LIMIT 1) AS GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH , CODE1.CODE_NM AS GOODS_KND_CODE_NM , IFNULL(CODE2.CODE_NM, '상품준비중') AS DLVY_STTUS_CODE_NM
ORDER BY A.GOODS_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

FROM STN_GOODS A LEFT JOIN DTN_COMMENT B ON A.GOODS_ID = B.CNTNTS_ID AND B.CNTNTS_SE_CODE = 'STN_ORDER' AND B.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN (SELECT MIN(ORDER_NO) AS ORDER_NO , ORDER_KND_CODE , SBSCRPT_USE_WEEK , SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , SBSCRPT_USE_MT , SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , ORDER_CO , TOT_AMOUNT , NOW_ODR , SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , GOODS_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM STN_ORDER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId}
GROUP BY GOODS_ID ) C ON A.GOODS_ID = C.GOODS_ID LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE CODE1 ON A.GOODS_KND_CODE = CODE1.CODE AND CODE1.CODE_ID = 'CMS009' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE CODE2 ON A.GOODS_KND_CODE = CODE2.CODE AND CODE2.CODE_ID = 'CMS022' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE CODE3 ON A.GOODS_KND_CODE = CODE3.CODE AND CODE3.CODE_ID = 'CMS023'

WHERE C.FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId}
AND B.COMMENT_ID IS NULL

SELECT dc.COMMENT_ID ,dc.CNTNTS_SE_CODE ,dc.CNTNTS_ID ,CASE WHEN (dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_000000ADMIN' || dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = 'USRCNFRM_00000000251') AND dc.WRTER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN dc.WRTER_ID WHEN dc.WRTER_ID IS NULL THEN B.MBER_ID ELSE B.MBER_ID END AS WRTER_ID ,dc.WRTER_NM ,dc.COMMENT_CN ,dc.COMMENT_SORT_ORDR ,dc.COMMENT_NO ,dc.COMMENT_PARNT_ID ,dc.COMMENT_REPLY_LC ,dc.RECOMEND_CO ,dc.UNRECOMEND_CO ,dc.USE_AT ,dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID ,dc.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,dc.LAST_UPDUSER_ID ,dc.SECRET_AT ,dc.SCORE ,dc.ATCH_FILE_ID ,g.GOODS_NM
ORDER BY dc.COMMENT_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: FROM DTN_COMMENT dc LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS g ON dc.CNTNTS_ID = g.GOODS_ID AND g.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_ORDER o ON g.GOODS_ID = o.ORDER_NO AND o.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG p ON p.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN DTN_MBER B ON dc.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID

sql.where:
dc.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND dc.COMMENT_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCommentCn}, '%')
AND dc.WRTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrterId}, '%')
AND dc.WRTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrterNm}, '%')
AND g.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchGoodsNm}, '%')
AND dc.SCORE = #{searchScore}
AND dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM >= STR_TO_DATE(RPAD(REPLACE(#{searchBgnde}, '-', ''), 14, '0'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
AND dc.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(RPAD(REPLACE(#{searchEndde}, '-', ''), 14, '0'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND p.CMPNY_ID = #{searchCmpnyId}
